content.rendered:
A Purr-fectly Pawsome Adventure!

Game Objective:

Guide your surfing feline friend through a series of challenging waves and obstacles, collecting precious seashells along the way.

How to Play:

  • Swipe Up: Move the cat to the higher line.
  • Swipe Down: Move the cat to the lower line.

Avoid Obstacles:

Watch out for rocks that can hinder your progress and potentially end your run.

Collect Seashells:

Gather as many seashells as possible to increase your score and unlock new levels.

Challenge Yourself:

As you progress, the waves will become more unpredictable, and the obstacles more challenging. Can you master the art of surfing and become the ultimate seafaring cat?
